country_event = {
	id = 71600
	title = "Dynamic Loc Country Handler Event"
	picture = "crisis"
	allow_multiple_instances = no
	is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				CLN = {
					check_variable = { which =  slot_itterator_variable value = 0.99 }
					NOT = { check_variable = { which =  slot_itterator_variable value = 1.99 } }
				}
				has_country_flag = due_for_slotting
			}
			set_country_flag = country_option_1
			set_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 1 }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				CLN = {
					check_variable = { which =  slot_itterator_variable value = 1.99 }
					NOT = { check_variable = { which =  slot_itterator_variable value = 2.99 } }
				}
				has_country_flag = due_for_slotting
			}
			set_country_flag = country_option_2
			set_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 2 }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				CLN = {
					check_variable = { which =  slot_itterator_variable value = 2.99 }
					NOT = { check_variable = { which =  slot_itterator_variable value = 3.99 } }
				}
				has_country_flag = due_for_slotting
			}
			set_country_flag = country_option_3
			set_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 3 }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				CLN = {
					check_variable = { which =  slot_itterator_variable value = 3.99 }
					NOT = { check_variable = { which =  slot_itterator_variable value = 4.99 } }
				}
				has_country_flag = due_for_slotting
			}
			set_country_flag = country_option_4
			set_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 4 }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				CLN = {
					check_variable = { which =  slot_itterator_variable value = 4.99 }
					NOT = { check_variable = { which =  slot_itterator_variable value = 5.99 } }
				}
				has_country_flag = due_for_slotting
			}
			set_country_flag = country_option_5
			set_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 5 }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				CLN = {
					check_variable = { which =  slot_itterator_variable value = 5.99 }
					NOT = { check_variable = { which =  slot_itterator_variable value = 6.99 } }
				}
				has_country_flag = due_for_slotting
			}
			set_country_flag = country_option_6
			set_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 6 }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				CLN = {
					check_variable = { which =  slot_itterator_variable value = 6.99 }
					NOT = { check_variable = { which =  slot_itterator_variable value = 7.99 } }
				}
				has_country_flag = due_for_slotting
			}
			set_country_flag = country_option_7
			set_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 7 }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				CLN = {
					check_variable = { which =  slot_itterator_variable value = 7.99 }
					NOT = { check_variable = { which =  slot_itterator_variable value = 8.99 } }
				}
				has_country_flag = due_for_slotting
			}
			set_country_flag = country_option_8
			set_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 8 }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				CLN = {
					check_variable = { which =  slot_itterator_variable value = 8.99 }
					NOT = { check_variable = { which =  slot_itterator_variable value = 9.99 } }
				}
				has_country_flag = due_for_slotting
			}
			set_country_flag = country_option_9
			set_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 9 }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				CLN = {
					check_variable = { which =  slot_itterator_variable value = 9.99 }
					NOT = { check_variable = { which =  slot_itterator_variable value = 10.99 } }
				}
				has_country_flag = due_for_slotting
			}
			set_country_flag = country_option_10
			set_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 10 }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				CLN = {
					check_variable = { which =  slot_itterator_variable value = 10.99 }
					NOT = { check_variable = { which =  slot_itterator_variable value = 11.99 } }
				}
				has_country_flag = due_for_slotting
			}
			set_country_flag = country_option_11
			set_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 11 }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				CLN = {
					check_variable = { which =  slot_itterator_variable value = 11.99 }
					NOT = { check_variable = { which =  slot_itterator_variable value = 12.99 } }
				}
				has_country_flag = due_for_slotting
			}
			set_country_flag = country_option_12
			set_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 12 }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				CLN = {
					check_variable = { which =  slot_itterator_variable value = 12.99 }
					NOT = { check_variable = { which =  slot_itterator_variable value = 13.99 } }
				}
				has_country_flag = due_for_slotting
			}
			set_country_flag = country_option_13
			set_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 13 }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				CLN = {
					check_variable = { which =  slot_itterator_variable value = 13.99 }
					NOT = { check_variable = { which =  slot_itterator_variable value = 14.99 } }
				}
				has_country_flag = due_for_slotting
			}
			set_country_flag = country_option_14
			set_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 14 }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				CLN = {
					check_variable = { which =  slot_itterator_variable value = 14.99 }
					NOT = { check_variable = { which =  slot_itterator_variable value = 15.99 } }
				}
				has_country_flag = due_for_slotting
			}
			set_country_flag = country_option_15
			set_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 15 }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				CLN = {
					check_variable = { which =  slot_itterator_variable value = 15.99 }
					NOT = { check_variable = { which =  slot_itterator_variable value = 16.99 } }
				}
				has_country_flag = due_for_slotting
			}
			set_country_flag = country_option_16
			set_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 16 }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				CLN = {
					check_variable = { which =  slot_itterator_variable value = 16.99 }
					NOT = { check_variable = { which =  slot_itterator_variable value = 17.99 } }
				}
				has_country_flag = due_for_slotting
			}
			set_country_flag = country_option_17
			set_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 17 }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				CLN = {
					check_variable = { which =  slot_itterator_variable value = 17.99 }
					NOT = { check_variable = { which =  slot_itterator_variable value = 18.99 } }
				}
				has_country_flag = due_for_slotting
			}
			set_country_flag = country_option_18
			set_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 18 }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				CLN = {
					check_variable = { which =  slot_itterator_variable value = 18.99 }
					NOT = { check_variable = { which =  slot_itterator_variable value = 19.99 } }
				}
				has_country_flag = due_for_slotting
			}
			set_country_flag = country_option_19
			set_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 19 }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				CLN = {
					check_variable = { which =  slot_itterator_variable value = 19.99 }
					NOT = { check_variable = { which =  slot_itterator_variable value = 20.99 } }
				}
				has_country_flag = due_for_slotting
			}
			set_country_flag = country_option_20
			set_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 20 }
		}
		country_event = 71601
	}
	
	option = {
		name = ""
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = 71601
	title = "Dynamic Loc Country Bounce Event"
	picture = "crisis"
	allow_multiple_instances = no
	is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
		UTI = { set_variable = { which = itterator value = 0 } }
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 0.99 }
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 1.99 } }
			}
			UTI = { set_variable = { which = itterator value = 2 } }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 1.99 }
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 2.99 } }
			}
			UTI = { set_variable = { which = itterator value = 3 } }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 2.99 }
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 3.99 } }
			}
			UTI = { set_variable = { which = itterator value = 4 } }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 3.99 }
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 4.99 } }
			}
			UTI = { set_variable = { which = itterator value = 5 } }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 4.99 }
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 5.99 } }
			}
			UTI = { set_variable = { which = itterator value = 6 } }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 5.99 }
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 6.99 } }
			}
			UTI = { set_variable = { which = itterator value = 7 } }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 6.99 }
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 7.99 } }
			}
			UTI = { set_variable = { which = itterator value = 8 } }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 7.99 }
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 8.99 } }
			}
			UTI = { set_variable = { which = itterator value = 9 } }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 8.99 }
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 9.99 } }
			}
			UTI = { set_variable = { which = itterator value = 10 } }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 9.99 }
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 10.99 } }
			}
			UTI = { set_variable = { which = itterator value = 11 } }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 10.99 }
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 11.99 } }
			}
			UTI = { set_variable = { which = itterator value = 12 } }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 11.99 }
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 12.99 } }
			}
			UTI = { set_variable = { which = itterator value = 13 } }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 12.99 }
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 13.99 } }
			}
			UTI = { set_variable = { which = itterator value = 14 } }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 13.99 }
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 14.99 } }
			}
			UTI = { set_variable = { which = itterator value = 15 } }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 14.99 }
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 15.99 } }
			}
			UTI = { set_variable = { which = itterator value = 16 } }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 15.99 }
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 16.99 } }
			}
			UTI = { set_variable = { which = itterator value = 17 } }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 16.99 }
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 17.99 } }
			}
			UTI = { set_variable = { which = itterator value = 18 } }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 17.99 }
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 18.99 } }
			}
			UTI = { set_variable = { which = itterator value = 19 } }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 18.99 }
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 19.99 } }
			}
			UTI = { set_variable = { which = itterator value = 20 } }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 19.99 }
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 20.99 } }
			}
			UTI = { set_variable = { which = itterator value = 21 } }
		}
		country_event = 71602
	}
	
	option = {
		name = ""
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = 71602
	title = "Dynamic Loc Country Effect Event"
	picture = "crisis"
	allow_multiple_instances = no
	is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 20.99 } }
				check_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 19.99 }
				UTI = { check_variable = { which = itterator value = 19.99 } }
				NOT = { UTI = { check_variable = { which = itterator value = 20.99 } } }
			}
			set_country_flag = rename_loc_country
			set_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 0 }
			slot_20 = { add_province_modifier = { name = country_rename_modifier duration = -1 } }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 19.99 } }
				check_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 18.99 }
				UTI = { check_variable = { which = itterator value = 18.99 } }
				NOT = { UTI = { check_variable = { which = itterator value = 19.99 } } }
			}
			set_country_flag = rename_loc_country
			set_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 0 }
			slot_19 = { add_province_modifier = { name = country_rename_modifier duration = -1 } }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 18.99 } }
				check_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 17.99 }
				UTI = { check_variable = { which = itterator value = 17.99 } }
				NOT = { UTI = { check_variable = { which = itterator value = 18.99 } } }
			}
			set_country_flag = rename_loc_country
			set_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 0 }
			slot_18 = { add_province_modifier = { name = country_rename_modifier duration = -1 } }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 17.99 } }
				check_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 16.99 }
				UTI = { check_variable = { which = itterator value = 16.99 } }
				NOT = { UTI = { check_variable = { which = itterator value = 17.99 } } }
			}
			set_country_flag = rename_loc_country
			set_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 0 }
			slot_17 = { add_province_modifier = { name = country_rename_modifier duration = -1 } }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 16.99 } }
				check_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 15.99 }
				UTI = { check_variable = { which = itterator value = 15.99 } }
				NOT = { UTI = { check_variable = { which = itterator value = 16.99 } } }
			}
			set_country_flag = rename_loc_country
			set_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 0 }
			slot_16 = { add_province_modifier = { name = country_rename_modifier duration = -1 } }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 15.99 } }
				check_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 14.99 }
				UTI = { check_variable = { which = itterator value = 14.99 } }
				NOT = { UTI = { check_variable = { which = itterator value = 15.99 } } }
			}
			set_country_flag = rename_loc_country
			set_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 0 }
			slot_15 = { add_province_modifier = { name = country_rename_modifier duration = -1 } }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 14.99 } }
				check_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 13.99 }
				UTI = { check_variable = { which = itterator value = 13.99 } }
				NOT = { UTI = { check_variable = { which = itterator value = 14.99 } } }
			}
			set_country_flag = rename_loc_country
			set_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 0 }
			slot_14 = { add_province_modifier = { name = country_rename_modifier duration = -1 } }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 13.99 } }
				check_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 12.99 }
				UTI = { check_variable = { which = itterator value = 12.99 } }
				NOT = { UTI = { check_variable = { which = itterator value = 13.99 } } }
			}
			set_country_flag = rename_loc_country
			set_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 0 }
			slot_13 = { add_province_modifier = { name = country_rename_modifier duration = -1 } }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 12.99 } }
				check_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 11.99 }
				UTI = { check_variable = { which = itterator value = 11.99 } }
				NOT = { UTI = { check_variable = { which = itterator value = 12.99 } } }
			}
			set_country_flag = rename_loc_country
			set_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 0 }
			slot_12 = { add_province_modifier = { name = country_rename_modifier duration = -1 } }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 11.99 } }
				check_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 10.99 }
				UTI = { check_variable = { which = itterator value = 10.99 } }
				NOT = { UTI = { check_variable = { which = itterator value = 11.99 } } }
			}
			set_country_flag = rename_loc_country
			set_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 0 }
			slot_11 = { add_province_modifier = { name = country_rename_modifier duration = -1 } }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 10.99 } }
				check_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 9.99 }
				UTI = { check_variable = { which = itterator value = 9.99 } }
				NOT = { UTI = { check_variable = { which = itterator value = 10.99 } } }
			}
			set_country_flag = rename_loc_country
			set_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 0 }
			slot_10 = { add_province_modifier = { name = country_rename_modifier duration = -1 } }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 9.99 } }
				check_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 8.99 }
				UTI = { check_variable = { which = itterator value = 8.99 } }
				NOT = { UTI = { check_variable = { which = itterator value = 9.99 } } }
			}
			set_country_flag = rename_loc_country
			set_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 0 }
			slot_9 = { add_province_modifier = { name = country_rename_modifier duration = -1 } }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 8.99 } }
				check_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 7.99 }
				UTI = { check_variable = { which = itterator value = 7.99 } }
				NOT = { UTI = { check_variable = { which = itterator value = 8.99 } } }
			}
			set_country_flag = rename_loc_country
			set_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 0 }
			slot_8 = { add_province_modifier = { name = country_rename_modifier duration = -1 } }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 7.99 } }
				check_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 6.99 }
				UTI = { check_variable = { which = itterator value = 6.99 } }
				NOT = { UTI = { check_variable = { which = itterator value = 7.99 } } }
			}
			set_country_flag = rename_loc_country
			set_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 0 }
			slot_7 = { add_province_modifier = { name = country_rename_modifier duration = -1 } }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 6.99 } }
				check_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 5.99 }
				UTI = { check_variable = { which = itterator value = 5.99 } }
				NOT = { UTI = { check_variable = { which = itterator value = 6.99 } } }
			}
			set_country_flag = rename_loc_country
			set_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 0 }
			slot_6 = { add_province_modifier = { name = country_rename_modifier duration = -1 } }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 5.99 } }
				check_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 4.99 }
				UTI = { check_variable = { which = itterator value = 4.99 } }
				NOT = { UTI = { check_variable = { which = itterator value = 5.99 } } }
			}
			set_country_flag = rename_loc_country
			set_variable = { which = country_loc_slot value = 0 }
			slot_5 = { add_province_modifier = { name = country_rename_modifier duration = -1 } }
		}
